I am no scripter, so I don't know about it being possible or not, but logic says that if it were possible indeed, it would probably have been done by now. But, regardless, there is no actual need for it, as long as you know what you're doing and how it works. In other words, if you learn how to add AB, what counts towards cap and what doesn't, then you won't need the sheet, you will know what your AB is all the time.

Take it EZ!
